channel.description: Recent content in general on Visual Azure

item.title: Let's Learn Together!
item.description: Yes, it’s 2021. We’re already a month into the New Year! And if you are like me and many others, you’ve probably made a resolution to learn something new, or skill up on something you already have experience with. A Visual Guide To Azure My 2021 resolution: Learn all things Azure by completing all Fundamentals learning paths and validating my knowledge with relevant certfications! Specifically, these three – in this order.
